title: Expressing Your Opinion about a Movie

content.text: In this lesson, you'll learn how to share your opinion about a movie you just watched with a friend.

data.tip: The Dutch 'g' is a sound made in the back of your throat, similar to the 'ch' in the Scottish word 'loch'.

data.phrase: Wat vond jij van de film?
data.meaning: What did you think of the movie?

content.title: First Impressions
content.setting: The movie has just finished. You and your friend Alex are the first to speak.

conversation_flow.title: State your overall opinion about the movie
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké, dat was de film. Wat vond jij ervan?

conversation_flow.title: Give your opinion on the actors
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ja? En wat vond je van de acteurs?

conversation_flow.title: Ask for your friend's opinion
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ik vond de acteurs ook goed.

content.text: Great! Now let's talk about more specific parts of the movie. You'll learn how to agree and disagree.
To make a sentence negative, you often place 'niet' after the verb. For example: 'Ik vond het einde niet leuk'.

data.phrase: Ik ben het met je eens
Ik ben het niet met je eens

content.title: Discussing Details
content.setting: You continue the discussion, focusing on specific elements of the movie.

conversation_flow.title: Mention a specific part of the movie you liked or disliked
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Ik vond de film interessant, maar ik vond het einde niet zo goed.

conversation_flow.title: Say if you found the story believable or not
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké. Ik vond het verhaal ook niet heel geloofwaardig.

conversation_flow.title: Agree or disagree with your friend's point

content.text: Well done! Let's wrap up the conversation. You'll learn how to make a recommendation and suggest a future plan.

data.phrase: Ik zou de film niet aanraden
data.meaning: I would not recommend the movie

data.tip: The stress is on the first syllable: 'AAN-raden'.

content.text: Use 'Zullen we...?' to make a suggestion. For example, 'Zullen we gaan?' (Shall we go?). The verb goes to the end of the phrase.

content.title: Recommending and Planning
content.setting: You're ready to leave the cinema and decide what to do next.

conversation_flow.title: Say whether you would recommend the movie to others
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Dus, zou jij de film aanraden?

conversation_flow.title: Suggest another movie to see next time
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oké. Wat zullen we de volgende keer zien?

conversation_flow.title: Propose getting a drink to talk more
